Men's Belt Size Chart: How to Find Your Perfect Fit

Discover the right belt size for your waist with our easy-to-use chart. This guide helps you convert your pants size to the appropriate belt size, ensuring a comfortable and stylish fit for any occasion.

Waist Size (inches) Belt Size (inches)
30-32 34
34-36 38
38-40 42
42-44 46
46-48 50

How to Measure for a Belt

  1. Measure your waist where you typically wear your belt.
  2. If using your pants size, add 2 inches to find your belt size.
  3. For the most accurate fit, measure a belt that fits you well from where the buckle meets the leather to the hole you use most often.

Tip: A well-fitting belt should have enough length to pass through the first loop of your pants when buckled.
